# Not At All Indoor Adventures - Nipigon Fishing Guide

> Professional wilderness fishing guiding service specializing in trophy Brook Trout and Lake Trout in the Nipigon region of Northern Ontario.

## Business Metadata
- **Location:** Nipigon, Ontario, Canada (Base: Nipigon Marina / Alexander Dam)
- **Primary Waterways:** Lake Nipigon, Nipigon River, Lake Superior (North Shore)
- **Captain:** [Your Name]
- **Specialties:** Trophy Brook Trout (Coasters), Giant Lake Trout, Northern Pike.
- **Service Area:** 1 hour East of Thunder Bay, ON.

## Trip Offerings & Pricing (CAD)
- **The River Run (Brook Trout):** $550/day. Focuses on the Nipigon River system for legendary 5lb+ Brookies.
- **Big Water Quest (Lake Trout):** $750/day. Deepwater or shallow casting on Lake Nipigon.
- **Expeditions:** Custom multi-day wilderness camping and fishing packages available.

## Target Species Data
- **Brook Trout:** Peak season June-September. Specimens frequently exceed 20 inches.
- **Lake Trout:** Available all season. Shallow water casting in May/June; vertical jigging in July/August.
- **Northern Pike:** Trophy potential (40"+) in the weedy bays of Lake Nipigon.

## Equipment Profile
- **Vessel:** 20ft Lund Pro-V / 225HP Mercury (Optimized for Lake Nipigon's big water).
- **Tech:** Humminbird HELIX 12 with Side Imaging.
- **Tackle:** St. Croix Rods, Shimano Reels.

## Booking Information
- **Contact:** (555) 555-NIPIGON
- **Email:** hook@notatallindoor.com
- **Logistics:** Fly into Thunder Bay (YQT). 1-hour drive to Nipigon.

## Social Presence & Multimedia
- **Instagram:** https://www.instagram.com/gord_not_at_all_indoors (Daily catches and water conditions)
- **YouTube:** https://www.youtube.com/@not-at-all-indoors (Long-form guiding tutorials and Nipigon River expeditions)
